body_html: @prb12 the timeline gives cumulative time taken by each op type (e.g. total time taken by matmul).. Is there a way to see the time taken not just by op type, but by each graph node ? e.g. if i want to measure the time taken by the matmus inside a lstm cell vs. the matmul in the sampled softmax, how do I get that split ?
